title: Executive Order 5998-Classification of Charles Gallagher
content: Charles Gallagher, who, since July 1, 1930, has been serving in a position in the Post Office Department excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Postmaster General.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5998-Classification of Charles Gallagher Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361552
